books.author: by Sue Grafton
books.description: A homeless man inexplicably leaves $600,000 to Kinsey Millhone.
books.name: W IS FOR WASTED

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher is thrown into jail on trumped-up charges and must clear his name.
books.name: NEVER GO BACK

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: A detective investigates a supermodel’s suicide; by J.K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE CUCKOO'S CALLING

books.author: by J. A. Jance
books.description: The investigator J. P. Beaumont has disturbing dreams about his early days on the Seattle P.D. and his time in Vietnam.
books.name: SECOND WATCH

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: An imprisoned ex-lawyer schemes to exchange information about who murdered a judge for his freedom.
books.name: THE RACKETEER

books.author: by Michael Brandman
books.description: A continuation of Parker’s series featuring Jesse Stone, the chief of police in Paradise, Mass.
books.name: ROBERT B. PARKER’S DAMNED IF YOU DO

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Darcie Chan
books.description: Only one man knows an abused widow’s secrets, which revealed will change lives in her small Vermont town.
books.name: THE MILL RIVER RECLUSE

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Daunted by Christian’s dark secrets, Anastasia ends their relationship — but desire still dominates her every thought; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers. Originally published in 1985.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME

books.author: by Fern Michaels
books.description: To help her daughter, a Southern belle calls on her trusted friends to pull some strings at a Hollywood tabloid.
books.name: THE SCOOP

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Thomas Perry
books.description: Sam and Remi Fargo, a husband-and-wife treasure-hunting team, discover a Mayan codex.
books.name: THE MAYAN SECRETS

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Reunited, Anastasia and Christian face a world of possibilities, and unexpected challenges; the final volume in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED
